**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A large, stylized symbol of an eye adorns the top of this wooden staff, representing the watchful eye of the divine powers. The bearer of the staff can guide and protect, seeing bounties and tragedies that could befall them in the future. When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus to Survival checks to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=2406) or [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=2368) and to Religion checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367). **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Staff of Providence **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1549)
  • **1st** [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1451), [_create water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1476)
  • **2nd** [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445), [_create food_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1475), [_see the unseen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663), [_status_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1690)
Staff of Providence (Greater) **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_safe passage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1659), [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368)
  • **4th** [_cleanse affliction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1467), [_dispelling globe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1494), _status_
Staff of Providence (Major) **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 4,100 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** _dispelling globe_, [_scouting eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1661), _see the unseen_
  • **6th** _dispelling globe_, [_scintillating safeguard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=713), [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727)
Staff of Providence (True) **Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 308 1.1, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 64,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **7th** _dispelling globe_, [_energy aegis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1512)
  • **8th** _dispelling globe_, [_divine inspiration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1497)
  • **9th** _dispelling globe_, [_foresight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1537), [_overwhelming presence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1621)
name: Staff of Providence (True)
